trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for resources that can be added to an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 定義可加入的資源的基底類別<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes and flushes the resource to the document package.
trans-unit.target: 認可所有變更，並清除資源至文件套件。

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the Commit method may be delayed until the whole <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 根據設定的<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>，Commit 方法排清作業可能會延遲到整個<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>已關閉。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the I/O stream for reading or writing the resource.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回讀取或寫入資源的 I/O 資料的流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> for reading or writing the resource.
Returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource that is relative to a specified absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 傳回[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]之資源的相對於指定 absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The of the resource that is relative to the specified absolute inUri.
trans-unit.target: 之資源的相對於指定 absolute inUri 。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成員支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。
